title: How to Print a Prezi Presentation

steps.headline: Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.
Click the Prezi presentation you want to add a custom logo to from within the “Your prezis” section.
Click the “Edit” button on the top of your presentation.
Click on "Share" button on the top left and click on "Download as PDF"
Save the presentation after download is complete.
Select where on your computer to save the Prezi PDF.
Open you Prezi presentation and go to "File" then select print.

tyn: Adobe Flash Player 9 or higher installed
Internet Explorer 7 or higher, Firefox 3.0 or higher, Google Chrome, or Safari 3 or higher
text: Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.  Click the Prezi presentation you want to add a custom logo to from within the “Your prezis” section.  Click the “Edit” button on the top of your presentation.  Click on "Share" button on the top left and click on "Download as PDF"  Save the presentation after download is complete.  Select where on your computer to save the Prezi PDF.  Open you Prezi presentation and go to "File" then select print.
